member.name: M:Endpoint.Controllers.SubmissionController.Post(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Process and Validate the file to be saved
member.remarks:
File must be csv.
Headers: Sort Code,Account Number,Name,Reference,Amount
Body : Sort Code = number Account Number = number Name = string Reference = string Amount = number
member.response: Ok. Returns the filename and lines processed
